website_summaries.verdict: A gun cleaning kit in a high-quality toolbox, specifically designed for the task.
pros: Packs of 65 items in a heavy-duty case
A professional-grade cleaning kit with everything you will need to work on all common rifle/pistol calibers, as well as 12 gauge, 20 gauge, and .410 bore shotguns
cons: Some customers have reported that the lid of the case does not close securely
Additionally, this kit does not include any bore snakes

customer_reviews.title: Good general kit but won’t clean a .22 or 5.56
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and has plenty of extra storage space for various cleaning tools. The biggest problem I’ve faced is the adapter for the 22 rod is too large to fit a patch down the barrel and will not clean a 5.56. The two compartments on top of the case are also extremely tight and hard to close which makes them a pain to actually use. Other than these two issues everything else in the kit works well enough. If you’re looking for a general cleaning kit and don’t specifically need it for cleaning a .22 or 5.56 then this is a good kit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Allen 65pcs. Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome cleaning kit that cleans a variety of firearms. I like the fact it's in a tackle like box and you can store your solvents,oil and small tools underneath the trays. You can add a lock if needed. Worth the money I think.
customer_reviews.author: 1HipM3

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect as it should for cleaning firearms. I’m not sure why people are saying there is no 9mm brush, as the picture indicates you use the .357 brush for 9mm as well. A simple google search would tell you same thing. I’ve cleaned my 9mm with it and it works just fine. Anyhow this kit works well, I do wish the box, trays, and latches were a bit sturdier, but that my only gripe. Other than that it’s very comprehensive and has what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the cost. Came with everything listed. Just an FYI for people who might get confused even though its not listed in the description there is a picture that show it with cleaning solutions. There is no cleaning solution it is just 2 trays with specific places for each tool. The bottom of the box is completely open for anything extra you want to add to the kit. I have a few bottles of cleaner and oil along with a cleaning matt, cloth and boar snakes.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Nofziger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I searched for a gun cleaning kit that can hold more things than just cleaning rods and brushes. This box is deep enough to hold, cleaning solvent, gun oil, gun grease, touch up bluing solution and other gun related products. What is particularly handy are the two compartments on top of the box for small odds and ends (i.e. nuts, bolts, pins and small tools). It is see through so you can see what's in these compartments. There is only one other box like it in the same price range that I do not recommend unless you want to spend a minor fortune.
customer_reviews.author: NCD112

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.  The rods are cheap and won't stay together.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS PRODUCT. Poor quality. Bore snakes are far superior and if you need a rod, get a carbon or fiberglass one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect kit if you have multipule firearms
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect kit if you have multipule firearms. The fact that it has every bore brush you would ever need and a large compartment below to store all the supporting cleaning supplies, makes this the best cleaning kit for the money I've found.
customer_reviews.author: T. York

customer_reviews.title: This is good overall kit to have around if you have multi ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good overall kit to have around if you have multi caliber firearms but for a lower price. The price is high for what it comes with. Has no cleaning solvents or lubricants. The worst thing about it is the top cover hinge. It has very poor design and when you open it up, the cover falls off and it is a hassle to put it back to hinge every time.
customer_reviews.author: Arash

customer_reviews.title: Great kit. The top pop open trays are useless.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit with all the peices having a labeled place in their respective trays. No complaints. The trays that pop open on the top are almost impossible to close and that it makes them useless, trying to close it I had to put an extreme amount of weight on it and it cut my finger open.. but managed to get it closed. No it was not broke or defective and it did altimitly close, just a design flaw. The top trays are virtually useless even if the worked correctly so still not a big complaint. But the item won't receive 5 stars because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Allen Company 65 Piece Ultimate Gun Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: Allen Company “Ultimate Gun Cleaning Kit” •65 Pieces •Storage Space I definitely love my gun cleaning kit, multi use for revolvers, pistols and long guns: rifles, shotguns. Only thing i would point out is of they included a bore snake and it would really be “Ultimate”... I definitely recommend for new or old gun owners.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Brown

customer_reviews.title: 4mm rod broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: This set is very organized and can clean virtually any firearm. Plenty of space in bottom for cleaning supplies etc. On first clean however, cleaning a 22, the smaller rod snapped off some threads when pushing a patch through. I now don’t have the ability to clean my smaller calibers. Perhaps I just got a bad one, but product support appears to be limited, so I guess I’m SOL.
customer_reviews.author: kevin walsh

customer_reviews.title: This is the second kit purchased. The first one ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second kit purchased. The first one was missing a part and I called THE ALLEN Company and the person I talked to was going to help me, never called or emailed me back, my husband said it wasn't worth the hassle and we moved on. The second kit was purchased as a Christmas gift and when it was opened, the lid was cracked along the outer edge, and again the gift recipient said it was okay and not worth the hassle, the lid could be glued. The bottom line is, the kit has a selection of cleaning tools in an organized compact tool box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a multi gun family except .22's
customer_reviews.text: Owning many different caliber guns, I thought this kit would be perfect, and with the larger calibers it is. I have issues with the .22's The rods themselves that fit the .22 jags and brushes don't fit down the barrels. The smaller rods that work with the .17 caliber are to small for the threads on the .22 pieces. This is a huge quality issue negates the use for many of the pieces. On a good note. The bottom of the case has plenty of room for towels and cleaning supplies and I still find the kit useful for the larger calibers.
customer_reviews.author: rcharrisoniv

customer_reviews.title: Easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good idea. The cleaning rods broke while using them the first time. Box is cheap. I should have bought something with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Macho

customer_reviews.title: Low quality box
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews but felt I should let others know. This cleaning kit is very good quality one of the selling features for me was the available space underneath for cleaners and rags and such. This storage box is very poor quality. As soon as I felt how flimsy it was I went and bought a plastic Stanly toolbox for storage. Honestly this storage box is barely thicker plastic than a gallon milk jug.
customer_reviews.author: Rworld1

customer_reviews.title: Look at all this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This major kit looks and feels to be of quality. Cleaned 4 guns and had everything I needed. Of course you will need to supply the solvent and oil. I also ordered a bag of auto mechanic shop towels and everything stores in the large storage container. No complaints here. This will be overkill for someone with just a couple guns or calibers. For my needs, it is perfect. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you dont really use it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the kit with the brass cleaning rods because I thought they would hold up better but I was wrong. They were very brittle and on the first use the small caliber rod snapped on first use. This kit is ok if you use it occasionally but not for moderate to heavy use. Would not reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning kit and case
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a few months and really like it. I can verify that all pieces are durable and not cheaply made. I bought so that I could store cleaning chemicals in the bottom part which you kinda have to do or the case is very top heavy. So I put towels, a cleaning mat, and a bottle of rem oil in the bottom to balance it out.
customer_reviews.author: Julia B.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this kit has a lot of goodies. I have several weapons of different calibers including shot guns. This kit covered them all. The box is solid and seams like it will hold up well even carrying to the range. I was able to store all my swabs and spray cleaners/lubes in the box as well as rags and a towel and I really liked that. Nice kit and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not for all sporting clays shotguns or common cleaning products
customer_reviews.text: This kit won’t clean sporting shotguns with 32” barrels. Both the tigle rod and shotgun rods are 31” from bottom of handle to end adapter (for brushes, jags, etc.). Also the inside of the box is 7” deep and a can of Powder Blast to clean gunpowder residue is 8” tall with the cap on.
customer_reviews.author: Syngen

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. I love that everything is well labeled, it comes with some patches and Q-tips, and it offers space in the bottom to store all of my current gun cleaning tools. I only gave this 4 starts because the rod included isn't the best quality, but its as good as you can expect from this type of cleaning rod. Ultimately, I am happy with this purchase and would recommend it to someone as an intermediate quality cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Eehhh, lower quality than expected from Allen
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more than the basics, just with almost every caliber. The downside is the bore rod can barely fit in .22 and the brass grip on the cleaning tips can scratch the entrance of the barrel and possibly inside the barrel too. Both top compartmentscon the lid- broke as I tried opening them for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: TheShoun

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Small rod broke the first time my boyfriend used it. He was so excited about this kit I got him for Valentine’s Day. He started to clean his 22 and the rod broke the first time he put it in. Pretty disappointed we’ve never had something like this happen?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent Gun cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work for a .223 had to buy a separate kit for my ar-15. But other than that it’s a pretty well rounded kit for most other calibers. The case is pretty decent except you have to be careful with the lid when you open it the lid would slide out of alignment on the hinges and if you don’t notice it when you go to close the lid you will break the plastic clips on the lid side hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Tackle box
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before ordering this, they all didn't look to good but I figured I'd take a chance. Well, it came on time, not broken, it's actually a very nice set up. Two trays & a big box under to store cleaners & other items. I would've paid more if the box was metal instead of plastic, but that's just my opinion. All in all it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Kinda surpising
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a decent amount of cleaning tools in it. The pick is plastic which is pretty useless if you've ever had to pick off stuck on carbon. The storage space inside is pretty decent, it's lockable with a standard lock. The biggest complaint I have is that the top latch compartments don't line up too well so I had to dremel them and make them fit, I doubt they will last a year.
customer_reviews.author: John Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped Prime, which was nice. After opening I noticed that there were broken pieces to the top storage bin countainer. Gave it a 2 stars because the case was damaged and could potentially cut me. All the pieces were all accounted for. Returning in hopes of getting one that isn't in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Orland Orland Orland Orland Orland Orland Orland

customer_reviews.title: Useless for 22 cal
customer_reviews.text: You can only use the brush for a 22 cal no option for using a patch to clean the barrel.This kit comes with 2 sizes of cleaning rods. the small size works on a 22 for the brush but no fittings for using a patch . the 22 cal fitting for a patch will only fit on the thicker rod that is to big for the 22 barrel basically this is a waste of money - just buy individual items that you know will work and build your own cleaning kit
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: SEEMS TO BE SOLIDLY MADE, DID HAVE ONE PIECE ...
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS TO BE SOLIDLY MADE, DID HAVE ONE PIECE WITH THREAD END BROKE UPON ARRIVAL. ADDED STIFF FOAM TO BOTTOM TO HOLD CONTAINERS IN PLACE AND NOT SPILL. NOT IMPRESSED WITH WHERE THE DIAGRAM AND INSTRUCTION BOOKLET IS STORED IN BOTTOM OF TOP LID. ALSO FOUND STORAGE SIDE CONTAINERS TO BE A LITTLE DIFFICULT TO OPEN. WOULD LOOK INTO ANOTHER WAY TO FASTEN THEM FOR FUTURE PRODUCTS.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking kit however the kit itself isn’t very good for rifles. The metal For the rods isn’t very durable. Pistol rods are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Overall!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice kit, in a sturdy box. I especially like that each compartment is marked with the caliber/gauge, and that there is room to put all of my cleaning supplies in the bottom. My only complaint would be that there are no bore snakes, and it's missing a few calibers. I was very surprised that it didn't have 9mm, since that is a very common round.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Manson

customer_reviews.title: It has a lot of space underneath to hold cans of cleaning solution and other things like hunting knife etc
customer_reviews.text: This box is very roomy and has everything you need to clean your weapon with. It has a lot of space underneath to hold cans of cleaning solution and other things like hunting knife etc. It is a great kit and came highly recommended by a family member who worked in the armory for the Army while stationed in Iraq.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeLackie

customer_reviews.title: Very complete kit, room to add more below trays
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cleaning kit with lots of adapters, nothing made of plastic except box really. All brass ends and brushes. Very sturdy and plenty of storage below trays for patches, rags, oil and bore cleaner to keep everything conveniently in 1 place. The only negative about this kit is the storage compartments on top of case snap very tight,on the brink of snapping each time latched or unlatched so I wouldn't use them for stuff u would use often. But they are very shallow anyway...
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: The last gun cleaning kit you will ever need.
customer_reviews.text: This kit is a very high quality gun cleaning kit. It has almost everything needed to clean just about any gun you own or may own in the future. It does not come with solvents or lubricants but plainly states that fact. Most parts are solid brass. I was very impressed and would buy again. I serched everywhere and this kit is the best one I could find for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Randy from magnolia,tx.

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality, everything is plastic besides the brass prices. I bought this kit mainly because it is the only kit that I saw had a picking tool included, but the picking tool was super cheap and flimsy, almost unusable. I do like the fact that it has room for storage of oils and solvents.
customer_reviews.author: VuuFam

customer_reviews.title: All in one, no more searching for different caliber cleaning supplies.
customer_reviews.text: Works fanastic for all common calibers. Seems to be well made, so far ive used the 9mm brush and jag, the .22 brush and jag, and .50 brush and jag. One thing i found amusing is that one of the brushes or jag is labeled .375 instead of .357....whoever checked the final layout probably got fired.
customer_reviews.author: Whitey

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the hubby to clean his guns. He had been using an old hand me down kit. This works for every piece he owns, handgun, rifle, shotgun, etc. and it comes with just about everything you need. The case is nice and has space in the bottom for storing cleaning fluid, etc. He actually looks forward to cleaning his guns now!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Its a ok set
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit is ok. Everything but the .22 cal stiff is good. None of the rods or handles fit the 22 brush. I tried every rod and handle combo and nothing works. I dont know if theirs missing parts or wrong ones got put in. The box is good. A little on the thin side but good if your not tossing it around.
customer_reviews.author: That rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a very good beginner gun cleaning set. I like that it has lots of depth underneath to store bottles of cleaner and towels/rags. Bought some shooter lube and microfiber towels to keep inside.
customer_reviews.author: Matthieu Genay

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: The individual pieces is this set seem to be pretty good quality. However, the case it comes in feels really really cheap. Hopefully the latches will hold up but I’m not expecting a lot out of the case. I do love how each slot fits each piece perfectly. We will see longevity wise.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Keeps all your stuff organized
customer_reviews.text: Big box that has plenty of space to fit all your gun cleaning essentials. Box seems like it would break if dropped at a high enough height but it does it’s job. Brushes and equipment work fine and is an excellent starting point for gun maintenance items
customer_reviews.author: In Robbie We Trust

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, has a tray within a tray for holding your items.  Love IT!
customer_reviews.text: Be gentle with the box and don't over open, that should stop any hinge issues some have. It is a plastic box, they have to attach it somehow, they use fully open to do this. It has lots of room inside to add more products you prefer. It doesn't not come with any chemicals, no lubricants, no cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: A good starter kit for your basic weapon cleaning and maintenance
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tool box was large enough to allow large bottles of cleaners and lubrications and other cleaning accessories. The tools were well organized and labeled. Most of the cleaning rods were hard to assemble due to finding and installing the adapters and charge handles.
customer_reviews.author: Mako

customer_reviews.title: Instructions????
customer_reviews.text: All the .22 accessories in this kit only screw into a rod that will not fit down the barrel! What good are all these awesome parts and accessories if I can't use the rod they fit? Update......there is an adapter hidden in the kit to fit the .22 accessories to the smaller rod. It would be helpful if there were instructions.
customer_reviews.author: tim bidlack

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool box. Ive been usi g this for a while now and its held up great. Thanks !!
customer_reviews.author: Latosha

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and haven't had a chance to use it yet. Seems like it's a good value for the money and I love there's room in the bottom for all the cleaning solvents and lubes.
customer_reviews.author: matthew e abson

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs different brushes.
customer_reviews.text: A good base kit to be modified and added to. Unfortunately the .22cal cleaning brush threads into the larger rod, and thus cannot be used. Very important that it be replaced with another brush as the .22cal brushes are used for .223/5.56 bores as well. Plenty of room in the box to add more stuff and hold your cleaning chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: ParasitexCATZx

customer_reviews.title: Good overall value
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I need everything in this kit, but I do not believe I could have put a kit together with only what I need for less cost. Well made with plenty of items.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY

customer_reviews.title: Every Rose has its Thorns
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even known for a week and just opening one of the top lids instantly the latch just snapped right off. other than this issue I'm super happy with all the things that it comes with for the price for sure. It's great to have all the needed tools all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for but for the price it’s ok
customer_reviews.text: When I open the box it look just like what I was expecting but upon opening the package I found a tray inside the box broken just cheep plastic but the kits has every thing I need so I use it just won’t recommended to my friend
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: You get a tackle box full of goodies. There are other variations of the same thing but this did the job for my pistols shotgun and carbine. May have to buy a couple other things if you want it "all" but this is a great value
customer_reviews.author: Sara Amy Missi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. well layer out
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. well layer out. all slots labeled for the organizationally disabled such as myself! Perfect product for the firearm enthusiast plenty of extra storage for any extra accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Do it!
customer_reviews.text: Solid case for for storage and organization of all my rifle cleaning supplies. Replaced an old 50 cal can I’d been using. Now I have everything in one place and organized. I wish I’d bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Neat cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: A really good kit with just about everything you'll need for cleaning your rifles or pistols. I like the way the everything is organized and marked which makes it easy to find what you need. Plenty of room on the bottom for solvent, oil, rags, boresnakes, etc. This was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cageguy

customer_reviews.title: Even better for the price now.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good set up. Plenty of space for ammo and cleaning spray etc inside. I bought it at 56$ and it’s 43$ now. So if you’re on the fence buy it now cause I wish it was 43$ when I had bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Organized and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit. Plenty of room in the box to store solvents and extra patches. Nicely organized. The individual compartments for each brush makes it a joy to use. Exactly what I was hoping for. The adapters to use the .22 cal brush is kind of hinky, but overall it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this kit for my Army son while stationed ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my Army son while stationed in Afghanistan. His military issued kit did not contain nearly all the components of this kit. He was very impressed and uses it daily on his military weapons.
customer_reviews.author: Panna1007

customer_reviews.title: Okay box terrible tools.
customer_reviews.text: The box itself is okay, I wasnt expecting much for the price. The rods are a joke though. I snapped a connector for a brush and a rod segment on the first cleaning under a third of a pressure I would trust a decent set to hold easily. Spend the money on a better kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved, and in doing so, I somehow misplaced my gun cleaning supplies...... so, I purchased this as a replacement - It was a great choice on my part - room for storage and supplies - -
customer_reviews.author: NC10735285

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit
customer_reviews.text: Great so far. Only complaint is the sections of rods can be a little confusing getting them in the correct order. No big deal though. Really happy with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Baclay9

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit is totally beautiful, because every piece of this kit is made with excellence. I would buy this kit again. But I know it will last for a long, long time. Everything you will ever need for general cleaning. Great kit, not junk. I would wish that a cleaning solvent and a lubricant was included in this kit. I give it an A+
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: A Superb Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is well organized and well stocked. It contains everything you need to maintain your firearms, with the exception of cleaning solvents and gun oil.
customer_reviews.author: Gar

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: now my husband can get rid of the box of rags and stuff and gleams his guns right. Liked that it cleans hangup, rifles and shot guns. So hard to find a gift for him
customer_reviews.author: Keri Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: This product is as describe.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kit but its incomplete without the chemical to clean. The seller did describe every Item that was inside the kit. I would recommend this kit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Most of the item does not fit for example 20g or 22 lr brush has not fitting rod to fit very disappointed i bought it 3 months ago i just used it yesterday for the first time don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Think about it
customer_reviews.text: I hate the upper tray has to be put in the same way cause the handle is offset so if it isn’t turned right it won’t close and no way to tell if it’s in right until u try to close it all it needs is a lil arrow to show u witch way to put it i
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: excellent kit for all your guns, organized and roomy box for all your supplies. Like that all the cloth ends are brass and not plastic. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: branko perisic

customer_reviews.title: Great brass accessories!
customer_reviews.text: This box set got my best friend's brand new 700 from the store to right out on the range! It has everything! I love having it and I am usually complimented by the guys at the range when I bust it out! Allen does it right!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Badger

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible, but not great.. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The case is as flimsy and cheap as they could make it. There are no pieces dedicated to .556, .223 or 9mm.
customer_reviews.author: PhoQis

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning kit except that the first one never showed ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaning kit except that the first one never showed and when I did get it I found that their is no .223 or 9mm components which is what i needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: RB PA

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad. Looks bigger in the picture. It was also mostly for hunting and high calibers. Doest have 5.56x45,7.62x39,9mm or .45 cal. It does however have a .410 shotgun bore swab and brush which as many may know works just the same with .45 cal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top heave and easy to spill
customer_reviews.text: The main issue I have is that it is far too top heavy! It will flip over and spill all of the tools everywhere immediately if left open. Also, the middle layers are sized to fit in the box a specific way. Becomes frustrating to try and place the middle in the box and have to keep flipping it until it fits.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Could use a better toold tray. But good.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my pops for christmas. Opened all the packadging and the tray fell out and all the bits scattered on the floor. We like all the tools and options it came with including the extra space for chemicals and rags. But the trays holding the bits need a little bit of grip like a tool box should. Or one slip and the bits roll like marbles.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Beware.....Cheap, thin plastic box
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up today, 7/8/2020. I was all excited to dive in. I tried to open up the clear covers on top and guess what, it snapped off. The plastic box is made very cheap and very thin. I dislike leaving bad reviews, however I feel everyone interested in this needs to know prior. I purchased this kit mostly due to the extra room in the box...
customer_reviews.author: Keeley S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful way to store you gun cleaner
customer_reviews.text: A lot for the money, it has a lot of all the supplies you need to clean different guns.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Jean Baker

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stuff
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. I use it to carry a lot of my stuff as there is plenty of free space. So far brushes are holding up well. Nice to have all of the sides in one place.
customer_reviews.author: PHXScorpion

customer_reviews.title: Great package.
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit. Pieces hold up okay. Everything you need to clean up rifles.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kit - Unless You Want to Clean a .22
customer_reviews.text: .22 jags don't fit the smaller diameter rod (for a .17). Had to buy a rod and jags just for .22
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Features
customer_reviews.text: This case has a lot of nice features in addition to the included cleaning pieces. There are lots of extra spaces for added cleaning supplies. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: HD-FLHTC

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for hubby
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my gun loving husband for Christmas. He is so hard to shop for and this was perfect. His only complaint was there was no 9mm.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Kilker

customer_reviews.title: Good Pistol Cleaning Kit !
customer_reviews.text: For an all-round cleaning Kit for pistols ... this is it. Sure, it's plastic, but durable. I'm a good researcher of pre-purchasing products, and I don't think I could've done better for my purposes. Of course, if you're into rifles, get something else. There's nice space enough for my CLR can, Gunners Lube, wiping cloths, etc,etc. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: EliasA

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, this kit has everything you would ever need!
customer_reviews.author: Rumplstilskin

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, everything you would need.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for two different gun enthusiasts and they both loved it. It seems to include everything a regular person would ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability, .22 accessories not compatible with 5.56.
customer_reviews.text: .22 accessories wouldn't fit down my AR-15 barrel. Tried using half of one of the smallest patches with a .17 jag and broke the cleaning rod in 3 places. Buying a bore snake instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Minturn

customer_reviews.title: The lid has flimsy plastic fit-together hinges that are kind of crappy, but overall I'm very happy with the selection ...
customer_reviews.text: It's top heavy with the lid open, but once you put your oil and solvent in the bottom it stays upright. The lid has flimsy plastic fit-together hinges that are kind of crappy, but overall I'm very happy with the selection of pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot
customer_reviews.text: Dont use most of what it has but it i havent had to... yet. I will im sure eventually. Love the storage space to keep cleaning gear though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great value. It's difficult to find one kit that ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value. It's difficult to find one kit that has everything you need when you own multiple calipers. This one does. And as a bonus there is plenty of room in the bottom to store extra tools or cleaners that you acquire. I can finally contain it all in one kit.
customer_reviews.author: Sata

customer_reviews.title: Last kit you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: Easy and convenient set up with every brush and swab you will ever need. Tons of storage for all your personal preference do-dads like barbers brush, dental picks, cotton swabs, pipe cleaners and solvent. Now I need need some more guns to get use out of all this kit offers!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Branch

customer_reviews.title: Has enough but the huge box deceives how much is in there.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the package, I was excited to find a bunch of goodies and seemed like the box was about 25% full... has everything you need minus a bore snake but it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Andrew Keith

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Great kit!!!!! I added a few things becuase the different size rods are kinda confusing and non of the pistol brushes fit them. But luckily I had a nice hopes rod that holds the pistol brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: rods are broken very easily
customer_reviews.text: push rods for the small caliber break very easily i broke all of mine on cleaning the first rifle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent.
customer_reviews.text: decent kit but the scraper is plastic which I don't like. Also, the lid is not very secure which some people may like but I do not. Also, I had one piece missing from the kit. Manufacturer refused to send out a part, so I had to replace the whole thing! What a pain for a tiny bore brush!
customer_reviews.author: Randy82103

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel very ultimate...but the kit is mostly functional
customer_reviews.text: One rod broke, causing 2 rods to no longer function. The kit works, I was just surprised that the rods only lasted through only a few weapons being cleaned. Mediocre would fit the bill slightly better as a description, ultimate suggests the kit will be functional a couple years down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Nocent

customer_reviews.title: Rods are trash.
customer_reviews.text: Good amount of heads, and it's nice that you can keep your solvents and stuff underneath. However, I found the brass rod to be garbage, snapped on my first attempt, 2/3 down the barrel. Getting the snapped rod with the brush on out of the barrel was fun (read: not fun).
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby. He loves it. Big and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Griffville

customer_reviews.title: Decent gift for my dad
customer_reviews.text: The pick pieces are plastic, but everything else seems to be decent quality. Room for more items, such as a small bottle of oil and more cleaning rags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool box sized cleaning kit with room to store ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tool box sized cleaning kit with room to store your solvents, oils, and whatever else you want to keep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Read and decide...
customer_reviews.text: It came with a large chunk of plastic broken off of the case. I was fine with that and would have still given this at least 4 stars, but than after many uses on cleaning my 12 gauge a rod broke off cleaning my .22. I will let you decide if it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ronald pangburn

customer_reviews.title: Has everything and then some
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandpa as a Christmas gift. He was so overjoyed he was showing absolutely everybody but I had given him. It was definitely his favorite Christmas gift. It has everything in it and more. Very nicely made carrying tote.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Two of the cleaning rods snapped the second time i used them.
customer_reviews.author: Weebestie

product_meta.title: Allen Company Ultimate Universal Weapon Gun Cleaning Kit, 65 Pieces by Allen Handgun, Rifle, Shotgun Cleaning Kit (70540)
product_meta.description: Allen Company Ultimate Gun Cleaning Kit, 65 Pieces by Allen Handgun, Rifle, Shotgun Cleaning Kit (70540)
feature_bullets: Professional grade cleaning kit in a tool box for storage
Includes components for standard rifle/pistol calibers plus 12 gauge, 20 gauge, and . 410 bore shotguns
Components include bronze brushes, brass jags, cotton swabs, brass slotted tips, brass adapters, muzzle guards, cleaning rods, pick, cleaning brushes, and cotton patches
65 cleaning tools/supplies - see details in product description below
15" x 10" x 8. 75" tool box with dual latches

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
